instance.description: Find interfaces where the configured MTU matches the specified comparator and mtuBytes.
instance.longDescription: For example, if comparator is '<' and mtuBytes is 1500, then only interfaces where the configured MTU is less than 1500 bytes will be returned

comparator.description: Returned devices will satisfy <comparator> <mtuBytes>. Use '<' to find devices that do not have MTU smaller than the specified <mtuBytes> MTU

mtuBytes.description: The reference MTU in bytes against which to check the configured MTU

nodes.description: Include nodes matching this name or regex
